name: XRViewport
description: The WebXR Device API's XRViewport interface provides properties used to describe the size and position of the current viewport within the XRWebGLLayer being used to render the 3D scene.
content:
Secure context
This feature is available only in secure contexts (HTTPS), in some or all supporting browsers.

The WebXR Device API's XRViewport interface provides properties used to describe the size and position of the current viewport within the XRWebGLLayer being used to render the 3D scene.
